section.name: Triggers
section.p: Yes, PL-J will soon have support for triggers written entirely in java (or other procedural languages, of course).

Unfortunately, triggers have no standardized API, not even java triggers, so we are trying to provide all the available solutions as API:
PL/Java for PostgreSQL trigger API from Thomas Hallgren.
Object or Map based api with typemappers. (PL-J`s prefered solution)
Most databases don`t support triggers written in java, you need to write a java UDF, and a traditional trigger calling the java UDF.
